mapper.insert: insert into category (name, parentId, create_date, update_date) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select from category where parentId IS NULL

SELECT cg.id, cg.name as "name", cg.parentId, date_format(cg.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as "createDate", date_format(cg.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as "updateDate", cg2.name as "parentName" FROM category cg LEFT JOIN category cg2 on cg.parentId = cg2.id WHERE cg.parentId = #{id}
